Posts.Content: Kateygirl wrote: My hands are achy and have pins and needles most of the time. I have been on Femara since April and Zometa for 2 months.  It often keeps me up at night.  Has anyone had this side effect from these drugs?  Will it go away?    Kateygirl Dx 12/89 Stage 1, Recurrence 4/11 Stage IV Lung, Bone ER +/ PR +/ HER - Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: SE from Femara ?Zometa Kateygirl nancyh
